page.title: 08PETERS MARLAND.
page.content: This village which consists of four hamlets _ Winswell, Yarde, Woollaton and Peters Marland, has a population of 200, or 250 when Marland School is in residence. Since the village school closed, children of Primary School age have gone to Merton. Children aged 11_16 go to the Torrington Comprehensive School. Buses take children to these schools. The old school now acts as a Village Hall. Social events such as Whist Drives, Discos, a Christmas Party, and the Womens' Institute meetings are held there. There are no shops in the vullage. Most of the shopping is done in Torrington, Bideford or Barnstaple. The Post Office is at Twigbeare. The area is served by a bus from Okehampton which goes to Bideford and Torrington on Tuesdays and Saturdays, and Barnstaple on Fridays.
